title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012)
text: lievens provides Real-Time PCR Data Sets Lievens et al. (2012).

title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012)
Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012)
text: sample group defined inhibitor (“none”, “isopropanol”, “tannic acid”), respective inhibitor concentration, initial amplicon copy number. Note inhibitor concentration initial copy number amplicon independent concentrations obtained co-dilution. number replicates per group:
code: library(lievens) library(ggplot2) library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)  lievens |>   dplyr::distinct(plate, inhibitor, inhibitor_conc, copies, dilution) #> # A tibble: 15 × 5 #>    plate           inhibitor   inhibitor_conc copies dilution #>    <fct>           <fct>                <dbl>  <int>    <int> #>  1 soy             none                0      100000        1 #>  2 soy             none                0       20000        5 #>  3 soy             none                0        4000       25 #>  4 soy             none                0         800      125 #>  5 soy             none                0         160      625 #>  6 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         2.5    100000        1 #>  7 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.5     20000        5 #>  8 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.1      4000       25 #>  9 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.02      800      125 #> 10 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.004     160      625 #> 11 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.2    100000        1 #> 12 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.04    20000        5 #> 13 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.008    4000       25 #> 14 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.0016    800      125 #> 15 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.0032    160      625 lievens |>   dplyr::distinct(plate, inhibitor, inhibitor_conc, copies, dilution, replicate) |>   dplyr::count(plate, inhibitor, inhibitor_conc, copies, dilution) |>   print(n = Inf) #> # A tibble: 15 × 6 #>    plate           inhibitor   inhibitor_conc copies dilution     n #>    <fct>           <fct>                <dbl>  <int>    <int> <int> #>  1 soy             none                0         160      625    18 #>  2 soy             none                0         800      125    18 #>  3 soy             none                0        4000       25    18 #>  4 soy             none                0       20000        5    18 #>  5 soy             none                0      100000        1    18 #>  6 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.004     160      625    18 #>  7 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.02      800      125    18 #>  8 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.1      4000       25    18 #>  9 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         0.5     20000        5    18 #> 10 soy+isopropanol isopropanol         2.5    100000        1    18 #> 11 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.0016    800      125    18 #> 12 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.0032    160      625    18 #> 13 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.008    4000       25    18 #> 14 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.04    20000        5    18 #> 15 soy+tannic acid tannic acid         0.2    100000        1    18

title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012)
text: concentrated set replicates dilution series 100,000 copies soybean Lectin endogene (Le1) derived amplicon. Following samples series five-fold dilutions.
code: lievens |>   dplyr::filter(inhibitor == "none") |>   ggplot(aes(x = cycle, y = fluor, group = interaction(plate, inhibitor, dilution, replicate), col = as.factor(dilution))) +   geom_line(linewidth = 0.1, alpha = 0.5) +   geom_point(size = 0.05, alpha = 0.5) +   labs(color = "Fold dilution") +   ylim(0, 12000)

title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012)
code: lievens |>   dplyr::filter(inhibitor == "isopropanol") |>   ggplot(aes(x = cycle, y = fluor, group = interaction(plate, inhibitor, inhibitor_conc, replicate), col = as.factor(inhibitor_conc))) +   geom_line(linewidth = 0.1, alpha = 0.5) +   geom_point(size = 0.05, alpha = 0.5) +   labs(color = "Isopropanol, % (v/v)") +   ylim(0, 12000)

title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012)
code: lievens |>   dplyr::filter(inhibitor == "tannic acid") |>   ggplot(aes(x = cycle, y = fluor, group = interaction(plate, inhibitor, inhibitor_conc, replicate), col = as.factor(inhibitor_conc))) +   geom_line(linewidth = 0.1, alpha = 0.5) +   geom_point(size = 0.05, alpha = 0.5) +   labs(color = "Tannic acid, mg/mL") +   ylim(0, 12000) #> Warning: Removed 74 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range #> (`geom_line()`). #> Warning: Removed 74 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range #> (`geom_point()`).

what: lievens: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012) — lievens-package
title: lievens: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012) — lievens-package
text: Real-time quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR) data sets Lievens et al. (2012) doi:10.1093/nar/gkr775 . Provides one single tabular tidy data set long format, encompassing three dilution series, targeted soybean Lectin endogene. dilution series assayed one following PCR-efficiency-modifying conditions: PCR inhibition, inhibition isopropanol inhibition tannic acid. inhibitors co-diluted along dilution series. co-dilution series consists five-point, five-fold serial dilution. concentration 18 replicates. amplification curve 60 cycles long. Original raw data file available Supplementary Data section Nucleic Acids Research Online doi:10.1093/nar/gkr775 .

title: lievens: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Lievens et al. (2012) — lievens-package
